pages.text: BloodMagic Teams can be configured through the $(thing)bloodmagicteams-common.toml$() file in your config folder, and through FTB Teams settings.$(br2)$(l)Config File Options:$()

$(l)enableTeamBinding$()$(br)Default: $(#080)true$()$(br)Enable or disable the team soul network binding feature entirely.$(br2)$(l)showBindingUI$()$(br)Default: $(#080)true$()$(br)Show the binding selection UI when binding items. If false, uses the default binding mode.

$(l)allowBindingModeCommand$()$(br)Default: $(#080)true$()$(br)Allow players to use the /bloodmagicteams command to set their binding preference.$(br2)$(l)defaultBindingMode$()$(br)Default: $(thing)ASK$()$(br)Server default when player has no preference set.

$(l)FTB Team Settings$()$(br2)Team owners and officers can configure binding restrictions in their team settings:$(br2)$(thing)Soul Network Binding Access$()$(li)$(#080)All Members$() - Anyone in the team can bind items$(li)$(#080)Officers Only$() - Only officers and owner can bind$(br2)Find this in the FTB Teams settings menu.
